price: Gyesε Ibliis, wampene sε ͻbεka wͻn a wͻde wͻn anim butuu fͻm (brεε wͻn ho aseε) no ho.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa abā an yakūna maʿa al-sājidīna
